title: Highlight Navera in headline and update Good Choice modal image

requirements.summary: Update the main headline to include “Navera” and visually highlight only that word with a romantic glow + underline/marker effect without breaking responsiveness.
acceptanceCriteria: The main question text includes the name "Navera" and remains English.
Only the name "Navera" is visually highlighted (the rest of the headline keeps the existing style).
The highlight effect is visible in both light and dark mode and does not reduce readability.
Layout remains responsive across mobile/tablet/desktop and does not overlap the buttons container.

file_operations.description: Update the <h1> headline string to include the name “Navera”, wrapping only “Navera” in a dedicated element (e.g., span) and applying a romantic highlight style while preserving existing typography, spacing, and responsive layout. Keep usage of existing shadcn-ui Dialog/Button components unchanged where present. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a small, reusable CSS class (scoped via Tailwind layers) for the “Navera” highlight effect (soft glow + subtle underline/marker), ensuring it has readable contrast in both light and dark mode and does not introduce layout shifts.

requirements.summary: Replace the Good Choice modal image with the new romantic/caring static asset and keep existing modal image sizing and styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The Good Choice modal no longer references /assets/generated/good-choice-meme-v2.dim_900x900.png and instead references the newly added romantic/caring image in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The image renders correctly on iPad Chrome with no stretching (uses object-contain) and no broken asset paths.
Existing modal layout, responsiveness, and rounded/shadow styling are preserved.

file_operations.description: Add the new romantic and caring meme-style square image asset at this exact path so it can be referenced directly as a static file (no backend fetch).

Update the Good Choice modal image src to reference /assets/generated/good-choice-romantic-meme-v3.dim_900x900.png while preserving the existing object-contain, rounded corners, shadow styling, and modal responsiveness. Keep usage of existing shadcn-ui Dialog/Button components unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
